content:
Congratulations on your new goats, Luna and Leo! It's great to hear that you're taking good care of them.

To get the phone number of Tractor Supply Co., you can try the following options:

1. **Visit their website**: Go to [www.tractorsupply.com](http://www.tractorsupply.com) and click on "Contact Us" at the top of the page. You'll find their customer service phone number, which is 1-877-718-6750.
2. **Check your local store**: If you have a Tractor Supply Co. store nearby, you can visit their website, click on "Store Locator," and enter your location to find the phone number and address of your local store.
3. **Call their customer service**: You can also call Tractor Supply Co.'s customer service department directly at 1-877-718-6750 to place an order or ask about their organic goat feed.

Remember to have your store location or order information ready when you call, so they can assist you efficiently.

By the way, it's great to hear that you've been taking good care of Luna and Leo's enclosure! Fresh straw is always a welcome change for goats, and I'm sure they're appreciating the extra attention.

If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
